sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: 1900px X 602px

sub_fields.label: Background Size
sub_fields.name: background_size
sub_fields.instructions: Only use the "other" option if you know how to use the css "background-size" attribute.

sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: id
sub_fields.instructions: Enter an ID here (cannot start with a number and cannot contain spaces). This will allow you to anchor to this section from a link elsewhere on the page.

sub_fields.label: Section Classes
sub_fields.name: classes
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a list of classes here (cannot start with a number and cannot contain spaces). These are for styling that gets repeated in several sections on a page.

sub_fields.label: Additional CSS Styles
sub_fields.name: additional_css_styles
sub_fields.instructions: These are additional styles for the entire section. Use standard CSS to target areas of this section to modify.

sub_fields.label: Additional JS
sub_fields.name: additional_js
sub_fields.instructions: Use this to create custom JS to apply to this module. Wrap in a document.ready() to ensure proper loading of jQuery.

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Each row is based on 12 total blocks. So however many columns you add, the total block width needs to add up to 12.

sub_fields.label: Column Width
sub_fields.name: column_width
sub_fields.instructions: If a page is 12 blocks wide, how wide should this column be. (A 2-column layout would need 2 6-block sections).
